_comment: For every class in the provenance DB, we will have the following model views:
default     -- any one of the provided views for the class, chosen as the default - usually the igsn
alternates  -- a list of all available views and formats
gnaf  -- the gnaf-specific view based on the GNAF Ontology

alternates.description: The view listing all other views of this class of object

agls.description: Australian Government Locator Service (AGLS) metadata schema. Published as Australian Standard AS 5044-2010

agrif.description: Australian Government Records Interoperability Framework (AGRIF). OWL Ontology published by the Department of Finance of Australia

apa.description: The American Psychological Association 6th edition citation format

dcat.description: Data Catalog Vocabulary (DCAT) from the W3C

dct.description: Dublin Core Terms from the Dublin Core Metadata Initiative

ISO19115-2014.description: ISO's standard 19115 for Geographic Metadata, 2014 edition

metatag.description: GA's rendering of mainly Dublin Core elements in HTML for search bot indexing

alternates.description: The view listing all other views of this class of object

reg.description: The Registry Ontology. Core ontology for linked data registry services. Based on ISO19135 but heavily modified to suit Linked Data representations and applications

staticreg.description: A single-file view of the entire register of datasets according to the Registry Ontology. Useful for indexation of all the datasets by search bots.

metatag.description: A single-file view, HTML-only view of the entire register of datasets made specifically for indexation by the Google Search Appliance. Linkd to Datasets in the register have the 'metatag' view query string arguments appended.
